mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT e.permission FROM sys_user_role o JOIN sys_role_resource r ON o.role_id = r.role_id JOIN sys_resource e ON r.resource_id = e.id and e.permission is not null and e.permission != '' WHERE o.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT DISTINCT e.permission FROM sys_resource e WHERE e.permission is not null and e.permission != ''
